trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that represent data sources to data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklassen for kolonner som representerer datakilder til databindingselementer kontroller.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET støtter en arkitektur med kontrollen databinding som aktiverer webkontroller server til å binde til data i en konsekvent måte.

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Webserverkontroller binde til data kalles databundet kontroller og klassene som gjør det mulig at bindingen kalles datakilde-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller kilde kan representere en datakilde: en relasjonsdatabase, en fil, en dataflyt, et objekt for business og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden kontrollerer finnes data på en konsekvent måte til databindingselementer kontroller, uavhengig av kilde- eller formatet for de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, to perform most Web development tasks.
trans-unit.target: Du bruke datakilde kontrollene som følger med ASP.NET, inkludert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, til å utføre de fleste Web utvikling oppgaver.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You use the base DataSourceControl class when you want to implement your own custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker basisklassen DataSourceControl når du vil implementere din egen tilpassede datakilde-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: While any class that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is a data source control, most ASP.NET data source controls extend the abstract DataSourceControl class, which provides a base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Da klassen som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet er en datakildekontroll, de fleste ASP.NET kilde Kontroller utvide abstract DataSourceControl klassen som gir en base implementering av den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceControl class also provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, which enables you to programmatically assign the data source control to the `DataSource` property of a data-bound control and return data to the control as a basic list.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataSourceControl gir deg også implementering av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>grensesnittet, slik at du kan tilordne programmatisk datakildekontrollen i `DataSource` for databundet kontrollen og Returner data til kontrollen som en grunnleggende liste.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: Any ASP.NET control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class can bind to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Alle ASP.NET-kontrollen som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>klassen kan binde til en kilde-kontroll for dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> is bound to a data source control, data binding is performed automatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>er bundet til en datakildekontroll databinding utføres automatisk under kjøring.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: You can also use data source controls with ASP.NET controls that expose a `DataSource` or `DataSourceID` property and support basic data binding, but are not derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke kilde kontroller med ASP.NET-kontroller som bruker en `DataSource` eller `DataSourceID` egenskapen og støtte grunnleggende databinding, men er ikke utledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: When using these data-bound controls, you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker disse databundet kontrollene, må du eksplisitt kalle den `DataBind` metoden.

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om databinding, se [ASP.NET Data Access innhold kartet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).

trans-unit.source: You can think of a data source control as the combination of the DataSourceControl object and its associated lists of data, called data source views.
trans-unit.target: Du kan se til en kilde-kontroll for data som kombinasjonen av DataSourceControl-objektet og de tilknyttede listene med data, kalt datakildevisninger.

trans-unit.source: Each list of data is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: Hver liste med data som er representert av en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a DataSourceControl is always associated with one or more named <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den underliggende datalagring inneholder én eller flere lister med data, en DataSourceControl alltid er knyttet til én eller flere navngitte <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface defines the methods that all data source controls use to interact with data source views: the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> method is used to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> method is used to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>grensesnittet definerer metodene alle datakildekontroller bruke kan samhandle med datakildevisninger: den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>metoden brukes til å liste opp datakildevisninger som er tilknyttet datakildekontrollen, og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>metoden brukes til å hente en bestemt datakildeforekomst for visningen etter navn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can also think of the data source control as two distinct interfaces that callers use to access data.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også se kontrollens datakilden som to ulike grensesnitt som brukere bruker til å få tilgang til data.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceControl class is the interface that page developers interact with directly when developing a Web Forms page, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class is the interface that data-bound controls and data-bound control authors interact with.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataSourceControl er grensesnittet siden utviklere samhandle med direkte når du utvikler en Web-skjemaer side og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klassen er grensesnittet databundet kontroller og databundet kontrollen forfattere samhandle med.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object is available only at run time, any state persisted for the data source control or data source view must be exposed directly by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekt er tilgjengelig bare ved kjøretid, noen tilstand fast for kontrollen som datakilde eller datakildevisningen må vises direkte fra datakildekontrollen data.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: There is no visual rendering of ASP.NET data source controls; they are implemented as controls so you can create them declaratively, and to optionally allow them to participate in state management.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ingen visual gjengivelse av ASP.NET kilde kontroller; de implementeres som kontroller slik at du kan opprette deklarativt, og eventuelt de skal kunne delta i tilstanden management.

trans-unit.source: As a result, data source controls do not support visual features such as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet støtter datakildekontroller ikke visuelle funksjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Applies the style properties that are defined in the page style sheet to the control.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder stilegenskaper som er definert i siden stilarket til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> containing the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> som inneholder kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Henter server kontroll-ID som genereres av ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: The server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: Server-kontrollen ID generert av ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes ikke til kilden kontroller.

trans-unit.source: This property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> base class is not used for data source controls because data source controls do not render markup.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>basisklassen brukes ikke til kilden Kontroller fordi datakildekontroller ikke gjengis markup.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes ikke til kilden kontroller.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objektet som representerer underordnede kontroller for en angitt serverkontroll i Brukergrensesnittet hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av underordnede kontroller for den angitte serverkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en samling skal kunne lagres underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this control supports themes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen støtter oppsett.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control has no visual rendering, it does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontrollen har ingen visual gjengivelse, støtter ikke oppsett.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the EnableTheming property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi verdien for egenskapen EnableTheming.

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified id parameter.
trans-unit.target: Søker gjeldende beholder for navngivning for serverkontroll med angitt id parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for kontrollen som skal finnes.

trans-unit.source: The specified control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte kontrollen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den angitte kontrollen ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: Sett inn fokus til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control has no visual rendering, calling the Focus method on it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontrollen har ingen visual gjengivelse kaller fokus-metoden på det oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call the Focus method.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å kalle metoden fokus.

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Henter navngitt datakildevisningen tilknyttet datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can enumerate through the set of views currently associated with the data source control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gå gjennom sett med visninger som er tilknyttet datakildekontrollen data ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Datakilde kontrollen klasser støtter én eller flere visninger i de underliggende dataene.

trans-unit.source: These views are represented by instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: Disse visningene representeres av forekomster av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, does all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.
trans-unit.target: Datakildevisningen definerer mulighetene for en datakildekontroll, gjør alt arbeidet som er nødvendig for å hente data fra den underliggende datakilden, og utfører operasjoner, for eksempel sortering, innsetting, sletting og oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class's default implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klassens standard implementering returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class, override the GetView method to return the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klasse, overstyre metoden GetView for å returnere den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> til å hente.

trans-unit.source: In data source controls that support only one view, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: I kontroller for datakilden som støtter bare én visning, for eksempel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref>, ignoreres denne parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Returns the named <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den navngitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling navn, som representerer listen over <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> collection of names is the allowable set of values that can be passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>samling navn er tillatte settet med verdier som kan sendes til den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class, which is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class's <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> implementation, checks the GetViewNames method for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> calls to determine whether the data source control is associated with one or more data source views.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klassen som brukes for det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klassens <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>implementering, kontrollerer metoden GetViewNames for begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A>kall til å finne ut om datakildekontrollen er knyttet til én eller flere kilde visninger.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: If GetViewNames returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the method, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A> returns `false` and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis GetViewNames returnerer `null`, som er standard implementering av metoden <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A>returnerer `false` og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A>returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23ContainsListCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class's default implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klassens standard implementering returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class, override the GetViewNames method to return a collection of view names.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klasse, overstyre metoden GetViewNames for å returnere en samling av visningsnavn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om serverkontrollen inneholder alle underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen inneholder andre kontroller. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary additional work.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent varsler en databundet kontroll at den underliggende datakilden eller data som er bufret i minnet er endret, og at kontrollen skal binde og utføre nødvendige ekstra arbeid.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent method is called when a property of the data source control or a parameter value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseDataSourceChangedEvent kalles når en egenskap for datakildekontrollen eller en parameterverdi er endret.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Genererer serverinnholdet til en angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objekt og lagrer sporingsinformasjon om kontrollen Hvis sporing er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet som mottar kontrollinnholdet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the skin to apply to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter verktøylinje skal brukes i <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control has no visual rendering, you cannot set the SkinID property.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontrollen har ingen visual gjengivelse, du kan ikke angi egenskapen SkinID.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <XRef:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the SkinID property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å sette verdien til egenskapen SkinID.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the data source control is associated with one or more lists of data.
trans-unit.target: Angir om dataene kildekontrollen er knyttet til én eller flere lister med data.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to determine whether the current object can be used as a source of one or more lists of data.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å fastsette om det gjeldende objektet kan brukes som kilde for én eller flere lister med data.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects; therefore, when associated with one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects, a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control represents a list source object and the property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Kilden kontroller omfatter deres lister med data som <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekter; derfor når knyttet til én eller flere <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekter, en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontrollen representerer listen kildeobjekt og egenskapen returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: This property calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the current data source control can be used as a source of data.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kaller statiske <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å finne ut om de gjeldende datakilde kan brukes som en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a valid collection of view names.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klassen bestemmer om den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>metoden returnerer en gyldig samling av visningsnavn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: If it does, this property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den gjør det, denne egenskapen returnerer `true`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>returnerer `null`, som er standard implementering av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>class, returneres `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> is associated with one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> er knyttet til én eller flere <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekter; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en liste over kontroller for datakilden som kan brukes som kilde for lister med data.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources of data.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å hente et sett med objekter som kan brukes som datakilder.

trans-unit.source: Data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects; therefore, when associated with one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> objects, a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control represents a list source object and the method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of one element, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> itself.
trans-unit.target: Kilden kontroller omfatter deres lister med data som <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekter; derfor når knyttet til én eller flere <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objekter, en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontrollen representerer kildeobjekt liste, og metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IList>samling av ett element i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of objects that can be used as sources of data.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller statiske <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente en <xref:System.Collections.IList>samling objekter som kan brukes som datakilder.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class determines whether <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> returns a valid collection of view names.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klassen bestemmer om <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>returnerer en gyldig samling av visningsnavn.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: If it does, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class returns an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of one element, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den finnes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klasse returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IList>samling av ett element i <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A> returns `null`, which is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class also returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>returnerer `null`, som er standard implementering av den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klassen den <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>klasse også returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IList>for kilden kontroller som kan brukes som kilde for lister med data.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets the named <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den navngitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Some data source controls support only one view, while others support more than one.
trans-unit.target: Noen datakildekontroller støtter bare én visning, mens andre støtter mer enn én.

trans-unit.source: The `viewName` parameter is ignored when this method is called on data source controls that support only one view, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls.
trans-unit.target: Den `viewName` parameteren ignoreres når denne metoden kalles kontroller for datakilden som støtter bare én visning, for eksempel på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class's default implementation, which is called by this interface method, returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klassens standard implementering som kalles av denne grensesnittmetoden, returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> method to return the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>klasse, overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A>metode til å returnere den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> til å hente.

trans-unit.source: In data source controls that support only one view, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: I kontroller for datakilden som støtter bare én visning, for eksempel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref>, ignoreres denne parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Returns the named <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den navngitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewName is .
trans-unit.target: viewNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of names, representing the list of <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling navn, som representerer listen over <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the names of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder navnet på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visually displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal se visuelt vises.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> control has no visual rendering, the Visible property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>kontroll har ingen visual gjengivelse, egenskapen Visible returnerer alltid `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the Visible property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å angi verdien for egenskapen Visible.
